org.apache.ctakes.ytex.dao

Class DBUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.ytex.dao.DBUtil

  • public class DBUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Oracle differs from sql server & mysql in handling of empty string. In oracle, empty string is null, in other platforms, empty string is non-null. We need a stand-in for the empty string in oracle; we use the string with one blank in its place.
